certification.translation[0].definitions: an official document that says that someone is allowed to do a certain job, that something is of good quality etc
We successfully completed the certification for open water diving.
the process of giving someone or something an official document that says they are allowed to do a certain job, that something is of good quality etc
certification.translation[1].definitions: the official act of approving a person, organization, or product and saying that they reach particular standards of ability, quality etc
Three prototype jets are currently undergoing tests, but certification by the US Federal Aviation Administration is not expected until next year.
